name: Sage Bundle for Love+ Friendship
description:
Invite love, friendship and improve all types of relationships with our beautiful, lovingly hand tied white sage bundles. Each bundle includes a palo santo wood stick, wildcrafted white sage, red rose petals and a rose quartz crystal!

Rose Quartz is the stone of love. Use it during meditation or set an intention to bring love into your life or to improve relationships of all kinds.

White sage smoke removes negative energy from any space, object, etc., while the palo santo stick, sustainably sourced from fallen branches, invites only good energy in.

Handmade in the USA

Palo Santo from Peru

Rose Quartz from Brazil

Measures approximately 4" long. Each crystal is about 1-2"
